review_title: One of the most beautiful and powerful sports sedan
review_text: A beauty to watch...fun to drive....very powerful and very reliable car...driven on 75000 km one of the best any one will find in pakistan....leather seats with six way electric adjustment....2 airbags....automatic and triptronic ....climate control....v6 engine....6kmpl in city....11mpl on highway...Colorado black...17inch allows...genuine remote
helpful_votes: (0 out of 1 person found this review helpful)
